topic.title: Starting the Oracle VM VirtualBox Web Service Automatically

body.p: The Oracle VM VirtualBox web service, vboxwebsrv, is used for controlling Oracle VM VirtualBox remotely. It is documented in detail in the Oracle VM VirtualBox Software Development Kit (SDK). See . Web service start scripts are available for supported host operating systems. The following sections describe how to use the scripts. The Oracle VM VirtualBox web service is never started automatically as a result of a standard installation.
